articles.author: David J. Lynch
articles.title: U.S. seeks limited trade deal with E.U. as Trump’s deadline approaches - The Washington Post
articles.description: The potential accord with the European Union, which would spare European goods the 50 percent tariffs Trump has threatened, is one of a few deals the White House could finalize this week.
articles.content: BRUSSELS With only threedays remaining before President Donald Trumps self-imposed July 9 deadline, U.S. and European negotiators continue to haggle over a skeletal trade deal that would defer a reso… [+9931 chars]
